unauth_title: Oops! You are not logged in
unauth_intro: You are not currently logged in, but the page you are visiting requires administrator privileges, so please log in first.
notfound_title: Oops! The page you are visiting is not exists
notfound_intro: We're sorry, but we can't find the page you're visiting, please wait a moment, or contact the admin.
register_intro: You are creating a user. Once created, this user will have full authority to operate the node, including access to and store sensitive information, so please be cautious.
invalid_title: User name or password is invalid
invalid_intro: The username or password you entered is invalid, this may be because you didn't enter it, because there is no limit to the username or password.
login_failed_intro: We can't find a user in the database who matches the requirements, please check your input.
